title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: U.S. 41 Road and Bridge Widening
body: US 41 Road and Bridge Widening       The Georgia Department of Transportation is proposing to widen US 41 in the vicinity of the Chattahoochee River. The road widening project will require the temporary use of Chattahoochee River National Recreation land for construction activities. In addition, the project involves the replacement of the bridge over the river within the park boundary. US 41 Statement of Findings (3.6 MB, PDF file)
